Articles.Content:
Hi,

I am having a issue with gameplay on the Xbox One. Once I get to the Mun and especially Minmus when I plot a return to Kerbin Maneuvre Node the controls for the space craft stop responding i.e. I have no control of directional controls (Roll, Pitch and Yaw). Radial menus work and I can use Right thumb stick to look around. Staging also stops functioning. The game crashed last night while making the Maneuver Node to return to Kerbin. Currently lost in space around Minmus please help!

 

Thanks,

Mursaro
Are u running out of ec? Is your craft manned?

Craft is Manned and fully working EC ... fuel ... RCS ... its just after i create the maneuver node to return to kerbin. I did finally get back to Kerbin ... 5 console and KSP reboots. Each reboot allowed me to go one step further before controls locking up again.
Can u still save and load? Maybe loading a quicksave will help.

Yes I can Load quick saves... this did not work ... only full reboot temporarily fixed the issue. I was hoping this might be a known bug that is being worked on, really don't want to have to re-install the game and start over to fix this.
thank you for trying to help !
Upload the savefiles to an cload or usd device, than reinstall, then u could save your game but maybe the bug stays...
